value.title: Build conversation flows with multi-valued slots in Amazon Lex
value.excerpt: Multiple pieces of information are often required to complete a task or to process a query. value.title: AWS Announces General Availability of Amazon MemoryDB for Redis
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS), an Amazon.com, Inc. company (NASDAQ: AMZN), announced the general availability of Amazon MemoryDB for Redis, a fully managed, Redis-compatible, in-memory database. Amazon MemoryDB for Redis enables customers to achieve ultra-fast performance with high availability and durability for their most business-critical applications that require sub-millisecond response times.
